resources.string: Time and color come together in big frig\'n letters.

Chronochromes combines time and color to create beautiful and useful wallpapers. Chronochrome is an experiment in synesthesia â€• Can we become so accustomed to associating time with color that it becomes second nature? Might we one day ask, "What color is it?"
 
 Time + Color = Wallpaper
